smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'MainActivity' with '17' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'FractalsView' with '28' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'FractalsWallpaperEngine' with '15' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'WallpaperView' with '22' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: LabeledExpression
smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

instances.message: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: LongParameterList
smells.description: The more parameters a method has the more complex it is. Long parameter lists are often used to control complex algorithms and violate the Single Responsibility Principle. Prefer methods with short parameter lists.

instances.message: The function plotMandelbrot has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.

smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function run is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function run appears to be too complex.
The function run appears to be too complex.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function draw is nested too deeply.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught
smells.description: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

instances.message: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

smells.name: PrintStackTrace
smells.description: Do not print an stack trace. These debug statements should be replaced with a logger or removed.

instances.message: Do not print an stack trace. These debug statements should be replaced with a logger or removed.

smells.name: ObjectPropertyNaming
smells.description: Property names inside objects should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: LateinitUsage
smells.description: Usage of lateinit detected. Using lateinit for property initialization is error prone, try using constructor injection or delegation.

instances.message: Usages of latinit should be avoided.
Usages of latinit should be avoided.
Usages of latinit should be avoided.
Usages of latinit should be avoided.
Usages of latinit should be avoided.
Usages of latinit should be avoided.

smells.name: UnsafeCallOnNullableType
smells.description: It will throw a NullPointerException at runtime if your nullable value is null.

instances.message: Calling !! on a nullable type will throw a NullPointerException at runtime in case the value is null. It should be avoided.
Calling !! on a nullable type will throw a NullPointerException at runtime in case the value is null. It should be avoided.

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: context.getSystemService(Context.WINDOW_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to WindowManager.
context.getSystemService(Context.NOTIFICATION_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to NotificationManager.

smells.name: CollapsibleIfStatements
smells.description: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

instances.message: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.
Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

smells.name: ReturnCount
smells.description: Restrict the number of return statements in methods.

instances.message: Function onOptionsItemSelected has 4 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.

smells.description: Line detected that is longer than the defined maximum line length in the code style.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (menuSave == null) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: menuSave == null
Parentheses in (permissions[0] == Manifest.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: permissions[0] == Manifest.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
Parentheses in (grantResults[0] == PERMISSION_GRANTED) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: grantResults[0] == PERMISSION_GRANTED
Parentheses in (actionBar != null) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: actionBar != null
Parentheses in (runner == null) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: runner == null
Parentheses in (x1 < w) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: x1 < w
Parentheses in (resolution >= 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: resolution >= 1
Parentheses in (z * density) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: z * density
Parentheses in (uri != null) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: uri != null
Parentheses in (SCHEME_FILE != uri.scheme) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: SCHEME_FILE != uri.scheme
Parentheses in (task == null) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: task == null
Parentheses in (event.pointerCount <= 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: event.pointerCount <= 1
Parentheses in (width != bw) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: width != bw
Parentheses in (height != bh) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: height != bh
Parentheses in (width < bw) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: width < bw
Parentheses in (height > bh) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: height > bh

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: android.graphics.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.view.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: ProtectedMemberInFinalClass
smells.description: Member with protected visibility in final class is private. Consider using private or internal as modifier.

smells.description: Checks whether files end with a line separator.
